attributes.action: Impose harsher sentences for pedophiles, rapists, and sexual offenders.
attributes.additional_details: We demand the government impose harsher sentences on pedophiles, rapists, and sexual offenders. These crimes cause lasting harm, yet current penalties are too lenient. We call for stricter minimum sentences, no early parole for violent offenders, mandatory treatment, and lifetime monitoring for high-risk individuals. Victims deserve justice, and the public deserves protection. It’s time for laws that truly reflect the seriousness of these crimes.
attributes.background: We want the government to enforce tougher sentences, end early release, mandate treatment, and ensure lifetime monitoring for pedophiles, rapists, and sex offenders.

rejection.details:
The following petitions call for similar actions: 

Introduce mandatory life sentences for child sex offences
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/715556

Harsher punishments for sex offenders and bans near schools 
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/724225

Life imprisonment for rapists without release
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/710049

Keep Sex Offenders on license and the register for life
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/732367
